review.reviewBody:
I love Red Shiso's Dinner box, plz try it once for me!!!

:)

Always love ordering here, or eating in. Friendly service and quality food. Sometimes a bit slow getting orders, but it's worth it. Always love their rolls, recently ordered and enjoyed the Rainbow rolls
sooo gooood. one of my fav places for tuna tataki
Food was amazing as always, howver spent $80 and got zero napkins and zero chopsticks , quite frankly ; unacceptable ...

Honestly love the food here but the prices on door dash are insane. You can find equally as good sushi with a more reasonable price. $9.10 for chopped scallop role? I love eating at this restaurant in person but the prices are disappointing.
